altername_name: Arcade Hits Pack: Gunblade NY & LA Machineguns
Gunblade NY & L.A. Machineguns: Arcade Hits Pack
name: Gunblade NY & LA Machineguns: Arcade Hits Pack
overview: Two fast-paced and beloved arcade shooter games take you to the skies above some of America's most well-known locales. Up to two players control achineguns on two flying battle vehicles to destroy an android terrorist invasion. First, combat android invaders in New York City with your Gunblade helicopter gunship. Then, climb aboard a futuristic hovering gunship to battle a new force of android enemies in Los Angeles and West Coast locales such as Alcatraz, Yosemite and Las Vegas. Wii Zapper compatible and a host of added Wii features like online leaderboards for worldwide ranking and Wii Remote vibration complete the experience.
